title: Dynex DX-DTCAM Web Camera Driver
description:
This is the Driver needed to use the Dynex DX-DTCAM Webcam. Dynex doesn&#039;t have the driver to download on its website, and the driver CD comes with a bunch of bloatware and crap no one wants. I extracted this driver myself, so it&#039;s barebones and it works perfectly. 

To install, extract the rar to a folder on your desktop, then install your new hardware using the "have disk" option, select the "dynex webcam" folder, and select the "OEM7" file. You&#039;ll be good to go.


Enjoy!
